description: This header file declares utility functions related to WAN manager bus operations, such as retrieving parameter values and instance numbers, for use in a larger system managing networking components.

methods.name: GetParamValueUlong
methods.description: Retrieves a ULONG parameter value by name.

methods.name: GetParamValueString
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value by name, storing it in provided buffer.

methods.name: GetParamValueBool
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value by name.

methods.name: GetInstanceNumberByIndex
methods.description: Gets an instance number given an object name and index.
